name: cds-hr-system
description: CDS HR System - Complete HRMS with Individual Work Schedules

scripts.start: if [ -n "$ROOT_DIRECTORY" ]; then cd $ROOT_DIRECTORY && npm start; else cd backend && npm start; fi
scripts.install: if [ -n "$ROOT_DIRECTORY" ]; then cd $ROOT_DIRECTORY && npm install; else cd backend && npm install; fi
scripts.build: if [ -n "$ROOT_DIRECTORY" ] && [ -f "$ROOT_DIRECTORY/package.json" ]; then cd $ROOT_DIRECTORY && npm run build; else echo 'No build step required'; fi
